itemizedlist.listitem: KDE 2: At least the libraries and the base package. KDE 2 is shipped with many (older) Linux distributions. Very often it's installed by default.
Sword 1.5.3. Only required if do not install a precompiled binary package. Installation instructions for Sword are available here: Sword's installation
KDE 3: At least the libraries and the base package. KDE 3 is shipped with many Linux distributions. Very often it's installed by default.
Sword 1.5.7. Installation instructions for Sword are available here: Sword's installation
Curl >= 7.10. This is necessary for the remote installation features of the new Sword Setup Dialog.
